text:
Does IIS tomcat connector support IIS 8.0 or IIS 8.5.

When I add ispai_dll to Isapi Filter(IIS manager) we not able to access any application even http://localhost.

We are getting if we add dll only



Error:
HTTP Error 500.0 - Internal Server Error
The page cannot be displayed because an internal server error has occurred.

OS : Windows 2012 or 2012 R2 (IIS 8.0)


-Devd
creator: deepak8373@gmail.com
kpreisser@apache.org
text:
I'm successfully running the ISAPI Redirector 1.2.37 on IIS 8.5 (Windows Server 2012 R2).

Note: Make sure your Apppool is 64-bit (Set "Enable 32-bit applications" to false) and you are using the x64 version of isapi_redirect.dll. The DLL also needs to be added to the CGI and ISAPI restrictions panel.
If it is still not working, then maybe it's a configuration error.


However, please use the Tomcat Users Mailing List.
